posts.post_content:
clean back - unused

Sold for $200 - Paypal Friends and Family

SIZE: 5-1/2" X 4"  - SLIGHTLY BIGGER THEN A STANDARD POSTCARD


I see one went on Ebay in January for 170 plus shipping, but seems to be missing the bottom of it, with the players names:

[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/original-1910-PHILADELPHIA-ATHLETICS-A-L-CHAMPIONS-TEAM-COMPOSITE-POSTCARD-/143050845771?hash=item214e7eae4b%3Ag%3AfWEAAOSwmkBcEsdZ&nma=true&si=WhdmMryZiFY2G0dL6ZY5U5m5yi4%253D&orig_cvip=true&nordt=true&rt=nc&_trksid=p2047675.l2557[/url]


And one went at REA in 2013 for $500 plus, although the centering seems better there so that might explain that:

[url]https://www.robertedwardauctions.com/auction/2013/spring/121/1910-burke-atwell-philadelphia-athletics-team-postcard/[/url]



One went for $270 at LOTG this past year, and mine appears to be in better condition then it:

[url]http://loveofthegameauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=15782[/url]



Then another similar condition one, although with writing on the back for $323 at Goldin:

[url]https://goldinauctions.com/1910_Philadelphia_A_s_World_Champions_Burke_and_At-LOT8485.aspx[/url]
